ygData.subject: Re: Building new weapon skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I m PRETTY sure that magicians can give away summoned daggers.  It s a lvl 4 or 8 spell.  That s what my magician uses, though I m afraid I don t know the
ygData.messageBody:
I'm PRETTY sure that magicians can give away summoned daggers. It's a lvl 4
or 8 spell. That's what my magician uses, though I'm afraid I don't know
the stats, but the delay is fairly good.. If someone else takes your
advice, but is broke, they might want to ask a magician for one. The mana
cost is negligible, so they shouldn't charge you. You might talk a higher
level magician into summoning you a giant snake fang. I have NO clue on
what those stats are, though.


> From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>
> When I decieded to start working on my piercing and 1h blunt at 7th level
I
> went out and bought the fastest (not the best) weapons of each type. I
> purchased a regular dagger (for about 2 plat) and a 1h staff (for a little
> of 4 plat). The reason for the fast weapons is more skill checks! I was
> able to top both skills by the tail-end of 8th. If you can get a fine
steel
> dagger do so, they are a little faster then a regular dagger. I fought
lots
> of weak blues to build it up. If I found health lagging behind the npc's I
> would switch to my better (1h slash) weapon to 'catch up', then switch
back.
